horiz_grid.DESC: Quarter degree grid for atm/lnd. Normally used for CAM configuration using prescribed lnd, ocn, ice.
Quarter degree grid for atm/lnd, with the version 5 1-degree Greenland pole ocn, ice. Normally used for fully coupled climate model.
Quarter degree grid for atm, lnd, with 1-degree tripole grid for ocn/ice. Normally used for fully coupled climate runs.
Half degre grid for atm/lnd. Normally used for CAM configuration using prescribed lnd, ocn, ice.
Half degree grid for atm/lnd with the version 6 1-degree Greenland pole grid. Normally used for fully coupled climate runs.
Half degree grid for atm/lnd with the version 2 0.1-degree tripole grid for ocn/ice.
One degree grid for atm/lnd. Normally used for CAM configuration with prescribed lnd, ocn and ice.
One degree grid for atm/lnd, ocn/ice with the version 6 1-degree Greenland pole grid for ocn/ice. Normally used for fully coupled climate runs.
Two degree grid for atm/lnd. Normally used for CAM configuration using prescribed lnd, ocn and ice.
Two degree grid for atm/lnd with the version 6 1-degree Greenland pole ocn/ice grid. Normally used for fully coupled climate runs.
1.4 degree grid for atm/lnd with the version 6 1-degree Greenland pole o cn/ice grid. Normally used for fully coupled climate runs.
1.4 degree grid for atm/lnd with the version 6 1-degree Greenland pole o cn/ice grid. Normally used for fully coupled climate runs.
Four degree grid for atm/lnd. Normally used for CAM configuration using prescribed lnd, ocn and ice.
Four degree grid for atm/lnd with the version 5 3-degree Greenland pole grid for ocn/ice.
T62 gaussian grid with (94x192) grid for atm/lnd, with the version 7 3-degree Greenland pole grid for ocn/ice models.
T62 gaussian grid with (94x192) grid for active atm/lnd, with the version 2 1-degree tripole grid for ocn/ice.
T62 gaussian (94x192) grid for active atm/lnd, with the version 6 Greenland pole 1-degree (320x384) pop grid for ocn/ice models.
T31 gaussian (48x96) grid for atm/lnd. Normally used for CAM configuration using prescribed lnd, ocn and ice models.
T31 gaussian (48x96) grid for atm/lnd with the version 7 3-degree Greenland pole grid for ocn/ice models.
T42 gaussian (64x128) grid for atm/lnd. Normally used for CAM configuration using prescribed lnd, ocn and ice models.
Ten degree grid for atm/lnd. Normally used for a CAM configuration using prescribed lnd, ocn and ice models.
One degree trigrid configuration with homme atm grid, 1 deg land, ocean/ice Greenland pole grid.
One degree trigrid configuration with homme atm grid, 2 degree land grid, and 1 degree ocean/ice Greenland pole grid.
High resolution homme trigrid, one-eighth degree homme atm grid, one-quarter degree land grid, and 1 degree ocean/ice Greenland pole grid.
High resolution homme trigrid, one-eighth degree homme atm grid, one-quarter degree land grid, and one-tenth degree ocean/ice Greenland pole grid.
Trigrid configuration with T85 atm grid, 1 degree land grid, and 1 degree ocean/ice grid.
Trigrid configuration with T85 atm grid, 1 degree land grid, and 0.1 degree ocean/ice tripole grid.
Trigrid configuration with T341 atm grid, quarter degree land grid, and 0.1 degree ocean/ice tripole grid. Not yet tuned
Trigrid configuration with quarter degree HOMME atm grid, 1 deg land, and 1 deg ocean/ice grid.
Trigrid configuration with quarter degree HOMME atm grid, quarter degree land grid, and 0.1 degree ocean/ice tripole grid.
